page.title: 04Common Cuckoo
page.content: LENGTH> 33cm SIZE OF EGG> 20-26mm*14-19mm COLOUR> grey,brown and brown,white belly COUNTRY IN SUMMER> Britain COUNTRY IN WINTER> S.Africa HABITAT> Woods & Moor The common cuckoo may be heard as early as April.Cuckoos often return to breeding grounds for several years in a row. From May to July, one female lays about 15-20 eggs. The newly hatched cuckoo is completely naked and blind, and is raised by the mothers of other species in whose nests they are laid. In late July to September the cuckoo leaves the breeding area for its winter quarters.
